Name: Archibald 2
About the game: King Glass returned after defeat, gathering an army of bodyguards! But the brave warrior Archibald did not sit with folded arms - now he has a shield (right mouse button), and the arrows have acquired new properties! Continuation of the arcade game Archibald. Shoot from the bow at the enemies, avoid obstacles, use the shield to protect against the arrows of the enemies. Realistic physics stickman ragdol 20 new levels of varying difficulty Added new mechanics.
